name: Evoluent VerticalMouse 4 Smaller Profile USB Mouse, Right Handed
categoryPath: Electronics/Computers/Computer Accessories/Keyboards, Mice & Joysticks/Mice & Mice Pads

reviews.name: Evoluent VerticalMouse 4 Smaller Profile USB Mouse, Right Handed
reviews.reviewText: At my job, I am on the computer ALL day and often spend quite a bit of time on the computer at home too. I was starting to have severe wrist and elbow pain and tried everything from wrist braces to special mouse pads to adjusting my chair and nothing worked. Finally, as a last resort, I tried this mouse and the pain has completely disappeared. My wrist still gets a little tired on occasion but I haven't had any pain since I started using it. I even bought a second one to use at home after trying it out at work for a couple months. It's definitely expensive for a mouse but to me it was worth it to finally get rid of the pain.
reviews.title: 16 November 2011

reviews.name: Evoluent VerticalMouse 4 Smaller Profile USB Mouse, Right Handed
reviews.reviewText: It keep my hand sideways instead of flat and when you are on a computer 8 - 10 hours a day...it's very helpful. I love it so much I bought one for use at home too!
reviews.title: Already helping to relieve the stress

reviews.name: Evoluent VerticalMouse 4 Smaller Profile USB Mouse, Right Handed
reviews.reviewText: If you're picky about your mice, want button response that's not too hard to push, durability to take little falls off the pad to the floor, and have tendonitis or carpal tunnel, you won't be disappointed.
reviews.title: Solid build, reliable performance

reviews.name: Evoluent VerticalMouse 4 Smaller Profile USB Mouse, Right Handed
reviews.reviewText: well, it's very comfortable but I can't really tell if it's helping or not. It feels different from a regular mouse and just changing is good, so I like it but don't know yet if it's doing the job
reviews.title: 09 September 2012
